attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As it stands with 'Analogue T.V. Broadcasting' the rules are that any receiver, TV, Video Recorder, DVD recorder, needs a license because it picks up BBC transmissions, whether a person watches these transmissions or not.
With the advent of 'Total Digital Broadcasting' the BBC can now 'scramble' their transmissions as SKY TV does, so why can this not be done giving anyone who needs to watch BBC the choice of paying the license fee and instead of a piece of paper being issued a viewing card instead.

rejection.details: The title of your petition needs to be a clear call-to-action, not your name
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
